short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speed controller for all video players. Simply speed up, slow down ...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The cool Video Speed Controls extension will allow you to rewind, speed up, slow down or advance the video as you want. Customize everything for yourself. The extension is pretty simple but handy. It is fast and easy to download, does not have a lot of weight. With our Video Speed Controller extension, it will be much more pleasant for you to watch different videos, films. We have prepared an extension of high quality and easy to use. The product is absolutely free. Rather follow the link and install Video Speed Control with just one click of the mouse and you will be pleasantly surprised.
